system.requirements: Navigator, RT Rank 1 Only, Not from Renegade House.

description.value:
A Navigator of one of the many Navigator houses who has been chosen for their minimal visible mutations. Groomed for a young age to act as the face of their house within politics and posessing a keen mind and sharp tongue.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Navis Scion Replaces Rank 1 Advances as normal, but character still has their normal starting skills, talents, etc, All talents in this advance list are completely separate.
